body_html:
We have future in our requirements.txt: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/requirements.txt#L1
It came as a requirement for caffe2. It generally seems useful to have, but I can also work around it if we feel we shouldn't be using it. @soumith

body:
We have `future` in our `requirements.txt`: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/requirements.txt#L1
It came as a requirement for caffe2. It generally seems useful to have, but I can also work around it if we feel we shouldn't be using it. @soumith
